title: Sonny Terry with Johnny Winter and Willie Dixon - [1984] Whoppin
description:
Sonny Terry with Johnny Winter and Willie Dixon - Whoppin' (FLAC)
Release Date: 1984


Review by Ron Wynn:
The textbook charge usually levelled against Alligator sessions are that they're sanitized. You couldn't lodge that one against this set with a straight face; if anything, somebody turned Sonny Terry loose. It didn't hurt that Johnny Winter was around on guitar and piano, playing gritty blues with a passion. It didn't help that Terry didn't put any amplified muscle behind his harmonica, however. Otherwise, this is a strong session.


Tracks:
1. I Got My Eyes On You
2. Sonny's Whoopin' The Doop
3. Burnt Child
4. Whoo Wee Baby
5. Crow Jane
6. So Tough With Me
7. Whoo Wee Baby
8. I Think I Got the Blues
9. Ya, Ya
10. Roll Me, Baby


Lineup:
Sonny Terry - Harmonica, vocals
Johnny Winter - Guitar, piano
Willie Dixon - Bass
Styve Homnick - Drums


*** R.I.P. Johnny ***
